_description: Mock data artifacts for Detailed Writer + End-to-End flow (screening → PHI redaction → draft → clinician edit → finalize → PDF). All values synthetic, safe for demos/tests.

screening_row.observations: John Doe DOB 2019-05-14 MRN: MRN-12345 Parent email: parent.jane@example.com Phone +1 (555) 123-4567. Parent reports: 'He only says ~10 single words and points rather than using phrases.' No regressions reported.

phi_redaction_output.redacted_text: <PERSON> DOB <DATE_ISO> MRN: <MRN> Parent email: <EMAIL> Phone <PHONE>. Parent reports: 'He only says ~10 single words and points rather than using phrases.' No regressions reported.

prompt_example: You are MedGemma-Writer, a clinical technical writer assisting pediatric developmental screening documentation. Return a JSON object EXACTLY matching schema keys: clinical_summary, technical_summary, parent_summary, risk_assessment_overall, domains (array of {domain, rating, rationale, quantitative_scores}), evidence (list of brief evidence items), recommendations (list), citations (list with id/text/url). Input: patient_age_months: 24, structured_scores: {"communication": 0.3, "motor": 0.85, "social": 0.9, "cognitive": 0.88}, observations: "<PERSON> DOB <DATE_ISO> MRN: <MRN> Parent email: <EMAIL> Phone <PHONE>. Parent reports: 'He only says ~10 single words and points rather than using phrases.' No regressions reported.", image_summary: "No image provided". Return JSON ONLY.

model_raw_output.clinical_summary: This 24-month-old child shows signs consistent with delayed expressive language. Parent reports indicate approximately 10 single words without phrase formation. Structured screening shows the Communication domain below expected thresholds.
model_raw_output.technical_summary: Communication domain score 0.30 (below expected). Motor, social and cognitive domains appear within typical ranges (motor 0.85, social 0.90, cognitive 0.88). The combination of parent-reported reduced vocabulary and ASQ-3 communication score suggests targeted monitoring and referral for speech-language evaluation. Recommend short-term (4-8 weeks) in-home language stimulation plan and re-screening.
model_raw_output.parent_summary: Your child uses about 10 single words and is not yet combining words. This is something to watch. We recommend more shared reading and a speech-language evaluation if there is no improvement in 1-2 months.

domains.rationale: ASQ-3 Communication score below cutoff; parent report of limited expressive vocabulary

recommendations: Refer to speech-language pathologist for assessment
Start daily shared reading and language-stimulation activities
Re-screen communication domain in 2 months

clinician_patch_request.clinical_summary: Edited by clinician: I agree that communication should be monitored. Family advised for immediate speech-language referral and community resources listed.
recommendations: Refer to speech-language pathologist for assessment
Connect family to local early intervention services
Start daily shared reading and language-stimulation activities
Re-screen communication domain in 2 months
